channel.title: Haikus on Hassan Rahim Kamil
channel.description: Recent content in Haikus on Hassan Rahim Kamil

item.description: i Sounds of needle leaves bristle through my ears over the sunbled streamlet ii Clinking of pennies at an affluent building, a bedridden pauper iii Swans in ballet shoes under the spotlit bedlam tip toe, tippy toe iv A single mother And in her sinewy arms rests a smiling child v Robins chirruping under the blanket of clouds near the verdant meadow vi City lights and roads stand witness to waste flyers
